00055 {

00057 
00058   // SelfDoc::Opt(name, type, value, default, min, max, description)

00066   opts.push_back(WaveCount);

00069                              "Turn the non-parametric smoothing on or off."};

00075 /**
00076  * @brief This static function should be overridden by child classes
00077  * to return an object of the correct type initialized correctly
00078  * with the parameters in the string, string map. All objects
00079  * created this way should be deleted when finished using.
00080  *
00081  * @param param - Map of key/value pairs to initialize the object.
00082  *
00083  * @return Pointer toCreate object, this should be sub casted as necessary.
00084  */
00085 SelfCreate* CNLog2RatioAdjustmentMethodWaveCorrection::newObject(std::map<std::string,std::string>& params)
00086 {
00087     SelfDoc doc = explainSelf();
00088     std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> opts = getDefaultDocOptions();
00089     CNLog2RatioAdjustmentMethodWaveCorrection* pMethod = new CNLog2RatioAdjustmentMethodWaveCorrection();
00090     std::string strPrefix = getPrefix();
00091 
00092     pMethod->m_iBandwidth = setupIntParameter("bandwidth", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00093     pMethod->m_iBinCount = setupIntParameter("bin-count", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00094     pMethod->m_iWaveCount = setupIntParameter("wave-count", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00095     pMethod->m_bWaveSmooth = setupBoolParameter("wave-smooth", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00096 
00097     return pMethod;
00098 }

00110 /**
00111  * @brief Run the analysis.
00112  */
00113 void CNLog2RatioAdjustmentMethodWaveCorrection::run()
00114 {
00115     Verbose::out(1, "CNLog2RatioAdjustmentMethodWaveCorrection::run(...) start");
00116     isSetup();
00117 
00118     determineLocalProbeSets();
00119     if (m_pEngine->getOptBool("keep-intermediate-data"))
00120     {
00121         writeLog2Ratios("beforeWaveCorrection");
00122     }
00123 
00124     // The number of waves that we use will be set in the variable iNumberOfWavesToUse.  If no wave-count value is set on the
00125     // command line, at this point in the code we have m_iWaveCount equal to -1.  The plan is then to default
00126     // to the number of waves found in the CNReference input file.  If the wave-count value has been set on the
00127     // the command line we use this value only if it does not exceed the number of waves defined in the CNReference
00128     // file. If it does exceed the number of waves in the reference file, we default to the number found in the
00129     // reference and issue a warning.
00130 
00131     // One more complexity is that any instantiation of amFactory between samples will reset the value of m_iWaveCount
00132     // to whatever is on the command line, or the default of -1. Thus we need to calculate the value of iNumberOfWaveToUse
00133     // for each sample.  (This will add an open, read of number of columns  and close of the reference file.) Another option
00134     // which was previously implemented was to find the number of waves on probeset object.  This seemed to rely too much on
00135     // the algorithm not modifying the probesets in a particular way.  I didn't want to rely on that.
00136 
00137     AffxString strReferenceFileName = m_pEngine->getOpt("reference-input");
00138     if (strReferenceFileName == "") {strReferenceFileName = m_pEngine->getOpt("reference-output");}
00139     int iProbeSetCount = 0;
00140     if (m_pEngine->getOptBool("cyto2")) {iProbeSetCount = affx::File5_Tsv::getFileTsvLineCount(strReferenceFileName, "Cyto2", "WaveCorrection");}
00141     if (iProbeSetCount <= 0)
00142     {
00143         m_strGroup = "CopyNumber";
00144         iProbeSetCount = affx::File5_Tsv::getFileTsvLineCount(strReferenceFileName, "CopyNumber", "WaveCorrection");
00145         if (iProbeSetCount <= 0)
00146         {
00147             Verbose::out(1, "WARNING: Cannot apply Wave Correction as the supporting data does not exist in the reference.");
00148             return;
00149         }
00150     } else {m_strGroup = "Cyto2";}
00151 
00152     // Here we find the number of waves in the reference file.
00153     affx::File5_File file5;
00154     affx::File5_Group* group5 = NULL;
00155     affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5 = NULL;
00156     file5.open(strReferenceFileName, affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
00157     group5 = file5.openGroup(m_strGroup, affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
00158     double d = 0;
00159     tsv5 = group5->openTsv("WaveCorrection", affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
00160     int iIndex = 0;
00161     int iColumnCount = tsv5->getColumnCount(0);
00162 
00163     // We report the number of waves found in the reference file in the "affymetrix-algorithm-state" section of the cychp file.
00164     if (getExperiment()->getIndex() == 0)
00165     {
00166         getEngine()->setOpt("reference-wave-count", ToStr(iColumnCount));
00167     }
00168         
00169     int iNumberOfWavesToUse;
00170     if (m_iWaveCount <= -1)
00171     {
00172         Verbose::out(2, "NOTE: The number of waves used in the wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method will be the number of waves found in the CNReference file. This is because a separate wave-count parameter was not specified in command line input.");
00173         iNumberOfWavesToUse =  iColumnCount;
00174     } else
00175     {
00176         if (m_iWaveCount > iColumnCount)
00177         {
00178             Err::errAbort("Analysis wave correction wave-count parameter value " + ToStr(m_iWaveCount) +
00179                 " exceeds wave-count " + ToStr(iColumnCount) +
00180                 " available in reference file " + strReferenceFileName +
00181                 ". The number of waves used will be the number found in the reference file.");
00182         }
00183         iNumberOfWavesToUse = Min(m_iWaveCount, iColumnCount);
00184     }
00185     // We report the number of waves actually used in the "affymetrix-chipsummary-" section of the cychp file.
00186     getExperiment()->setNumberOfWavesUsed(iNumberOfWavesToUse);
00187 
00188     // Here we load the waves information into the probesets.  This is only done for the first experiment.
00189     if (getExperiment()->getIndex() == 0)
00190     {
00191         CNAnalysisMethod::getProbeSets()->quickSort(0);
00192         while (tsv5->nextLine() == affx::FILE5_OK)
00193         {
00194                         if (iIndex >= CNAnalysisMethod::getProbeSets()->size()) {Err::errAbort("CN Ref file and CNAnalysisMethod::ProbeSets vector are out of sync.\t" + ToStr(CNAnalysisMethod::getProbeSets()->size()));}
00195             CNProbeSet* p = CNAnalysisMethod::getProbeSets()->getAt(iIndex);
00196             p->getWaves().resize(iNumberOfWavesToUse);
00197             for (int iColumnIndex = 0; (iColumnIndex < iNumberOfWavesToUse); iColumnIndex++)
00198             {
00199                 tsv5->get(0, iColumnIndex, &d); p->getWaves()[iColumnIndex] = (float)d;
00200             }
00201             iIndex++;
00202         }
00203         CNAnalysisMethod::getProbeSets()->quickSort(1);
00204     }
00205     tsv5->close();
00206     delete tsv5;
00207     group5->close();
00208     delete group5;
00209     file5.close();
00210 
00211     Verbose::out(2,"The number of waves used for wave-correction is: " + ToStr(iNumberOfWavesToUse));
00212 
00213     int iLastAutosomeChromosome = getLastAutosomeChromosome();
00214     int iAutosomeCount = 0;
00215     int iLocalProbeSetCount=getProbeSets()->getCount();
00216     for (int iProbeSetIndex = 0; (iProbeSetIndex < iLocalProbeSetCount); iProbeSetIndex++)
00217     {
00218         CNProbeSet* p = getProbeSets()->getAt(iProbeSetIndex);
00219         if (p->getChromosome() <= iLastAutosomeChromosome) {iAutosomeCount++;}
00220     }
00221     if (m_bMedianAutosomeMedianNormalization)
00222     {
00223         calculateMedianAutosomeMedian(getExperiment());
00224         normalizeLog2Ratios(getExperiment());
00225     }
00226 
00227     for (int iWaveIndex = 0; iWaveIndex < iNumberOfWavesToUse; iWaveIndex++)
00228     {
00229         adjustLog2Ratios(iAutosomeCount, iLastAutosomeChromosome, iWaveIndex);
00230         if (m_pEngine->getOptBool("keep-intermediate-data"))
00231         {
00232             writeLog2Ratios( "afterWaveSubtract" + getInt(iWaveIndex+1) );
00233         }
00234     }
00235 
00236     if (m_bWaveSmooth) {
00237         for (int iWaveIndex = 0; iWaveIndex < iNumberOfWavesToUse; iWaveIndex++)
00238         {
00239             applyRunningMean(iWaveIndex);
00240             if (m_pEngine->getOptBool("keep-intermediate-data"))
00241             {
00242                 writeLog2Ratios( "afterWaveSmooth" + getInt(iWaveIndex+1) );
00243             }
00244         }
00245     }
00246 
00247     Verbose::out(1, "CNLog2RatioAdjustmentMethodWaveCorrection::run(...) end");
00248 }
00249 
00250 void CNLog2RatioAdjustmentMethodWaveCorrection::adjustLog2Ratios(       int iAutosomeCount,
00251                                                                         int iLastAutosomeChromosome,
00252                                                                         int iWaveIndex)
00253 {
00254     int iProbeSetCount = getProbeSets()->getCount();
00255     Matrix mxTemp(iAutosomeCount, 1);
00256     int iTempIndex = 0;
00257     double dSum = 0;
00258     for (int iProbeSetIndex = 0; (iProbeSetIndex < iProbeSetCount); iProbeSetIndex++)
00259     {
00260         CNProbeSet* p = getProbeSets()->getAt(iProbeSetIndex);
00261         float fValue = p->getWaveValue(iWaveIndex);
00262         if (p->getChromosome() <= iLastAutosomeChromosome)
00263         {
00264             dSum += (fValue * p->getLog2Ratio());
00265             mxTemp.element(iTempIndex, 0) = fValue; iTempIndex++;
00266         }
00267     }
00268     double dTempNorm = norm(mxTemp);
00269     for (int iProbeSetIndex = 0; (iProbeSetIndex < iProbeSetCount); iProbeSetIndex++)
00270     {
00271         CNProbeSet* p = getProbeSets()->getAt(iProbeSetIndex);
00272         p->setLog2Ratio(p->getLog2Ratio() - dSum * p->getWaveValue(iWaveIndex) / dTempNorm);
00273     }
00274     if (m_bMedianAutosomeMedianNormalization)
00275     {
00276         calculateMedianAutosomeMedian(getExperiment());
00277         normalizeLog2Ratios(getExperiment());
00278     }
00279     if (m_pEngine->isOptDefined("wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method")     &&
00280         m_pEngine->getOpt("wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method") != "none" &&
00281         m_pEngine->getOpt("wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method") != ""     &&
00282         getExperiment())
00283     {
00284         getExperiment()->addWavinessAmplitude(iWaveIndex, dSum/dTempNorm);
00285     }
00286 }
00287 
00288 void CNLog2RatioAdjustmentMethodWaveCorrection::applyRunningMean(int iWaveIndex)
00289 {
00290     std::vector<float> vWave(getProbeSets()->getCount());
00291     vector<int> vChromosomes = getChromosomes(getProbeSets());
00292     for (int i = 0; (i < vChromosomes.size()); i++)
00293     {
00294         int iChromosome = vChromosomes[i];
00295         if (iChromosome == 255)
00296         {
00297                 continue;
00298         }
00299         int iProbeSetCount = getProbeSetCount(iChromosome, getProbeSets());
00300         if (iProbeSetCount == 0) continue; // probably 23 or Y
00301         int iStartChromosome = getChrBounds(iChromosome, getProbeSets()).first;
00302         double* p = new double[iProbeSetCount];
00303         double* pRunMean = new double[iProbeSetCount];
00304         for (int iProbeSetIndex = 0; (iProbeSetIndex < iProbeSetCount); iProbeSetIndex++)
00305         {
00306             p[iProbeSetIndex] = getProbeSets()->getAt(iStartChromosome + iProbeSetIndex)->getWaveValue(iWaveIndex);
00307         }
00308         runmean(p, pRunMean, &iProbeSetCount, &m_iBandwidth);
00309         delete[] p;
00310         for (int iProbeSetIndex = 0; (iProbeSetIndex < iProbeSetCount); iProbeSetIndex++)
00311         {
00312             vWave[iStartChromosome + iProbeSetIndex] = (float)pRunMean[iProbeSetIndex];
00313         }
00314         delete[] pRunMean;
00315     }
00316     int iProbeSetCount = getProbeSets()->getCount();
00317 
00318     // Setup bins
00319     std::vector<int> vBinIndexes(iProbeSetCount);
00320     bin(vWave, vBinIndexes, m_iBinCount);
00321 
00322     // Apply adjustment.
00323     for (int iProbeSetType = 1; (iProbeSetType < 3); iProbeSetType++)
00324     {
00325         for (int iBinIndex = 0; (iBinIndex < m_iBinCount); iBinIndex++)
00326         {
00327             // Get autosome count per bin.
00328             int iProbeSetCount = 0;
00329             int iAutosomeProbeSetCount = 0;
00330             for (int iRowIndex = 0; (iRowIndex < getProbeSets()->getCount()); iRowIndex++)
00331             {
00332                 CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->getAt(iRowIndex);
00333                 if ((iProbeSetType == 1) && (pobjProbeSet->getProcessFlag() != 1)) {continue;}
00334                 if ((iProbeSetType == 2) && (pobjProbeSet->getProcessFlag() < 2)) {continue;}
00335                 if (vBinIndexes[iRowIndex] == iBinIndex)
00336                 {
00337                     iProbeSetCount++;
00338                     if (pobjProbeSet->getChromosome() < m_iXChromosome) // is autosome.
00339                     {
00340                         iAutosomeProbeSetCount++;
00341                     }
00342                 }
00343             }
00344             std::vector<int> vIndexes(iProbeSetCount);
00345             std::vector<int> vAutosomeIndexes(iAutosomeProbeSetCount);
00346             // Get autosome count per bin.
00347             int i1 = 0;
00348             int i2 = 0;
00349             for (int iRowIndex = 0; (iRowIndex < getProbeSets()->getCount()); iRowIndex++)
00350             {
00351                 CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->getAt(iRowIndex);
00352                 if ((iProbeSetType == 1) && (pobjProbeSet->getProcessFlag() != 1)) {continue;}
00353                 if ((iProbeSetType == 2) && (pobjProbeSet->getProcessFlag() < 2)) {continue;}
00354                 if (vBinIndexes[iRowIndex] == iBinIndex)
00355                 {
00356                     vIndexes[i1] = iRowIndex; i1++;
00357                     if (pobjProbeSet->getChromosome() < m_iXChromosome) // is autosome.
00358                     {
00359                         vAutosomeIndexes[i2] = iRowIndex; i2++;
00360                     }
00361                 }
00362             }
00363             if (iAutosomeProbeSetCount > 0)
00364             {
00365                 // Calculate autosome median for each bin.
00366                 AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float> vLog2Ratios(iAutosomeProbeSetCount);
00367                 for (int iRowIndex = 0; (iRowIndex < vAutosomeIndexes.size()); iRowIndex++)
00368                 {
00369                     CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->getAt(vAutosomeIndexes[iRowIndex]);
00370                     vLog2Ratios.set(iRowIndex, pobjProbeSet->getLog2Ratio());
00371                 }
00372                 // Perform actual adjustment.
00373                 double dMedianLog2Ratio = vLog2Ratios.median();
00374                 if (dMedianLog2Ratio == dMedianLog2Ratio) // Not NaN
00375                 {
00376                     for (int iRowIndex = 0; (iRowIndex < vIndexes.size()); iRowIndex++)
00377                     {
00378                         CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = getProbeSets()->getAt(vIndexes[iRowIndex]);
00379                         float fLog2Ratio = pobjProbeSet->getLog2Ratio();
00380                         fLog2Ratio -= dMedianLog2Ratio;
00381                         pobjProbeSet->setLog2Ratio(fLog2Ratio);
00382                     }
00383                 }
00384             }
00385         }
00386     }
00387 }
